docs.snippet: Here are six of the biggest stories driving American politics this week.

headline.print_headline: Even by Trump Standards, a Lot Has Happened This Week. Let Us Catch You Up.
headline.main: Even by Trump Standards, a Lot Has Happened This Week. Let Us Catch You Up.

docs.snippet: The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS.

President Donald Trump's lawyers are asking a New York state appeals court to throw out or freeze a defamation lawsuit by a former contestant on "The Apprentice" who has accused Trump of unwanted kissing and groping.

headline.print_headline: Trump Lawyers Launch Appeal in 'Apprentice' Contestant Suit
headline.main: Trump Lawyers Launch Appeal in 'Apprentice' Contestant Suit

docs.snippet: China’s foreign minister issues a stern warning that “the outcome will only be harmful” if the U.S. imposes more tariffs.

headline.print_headline: China Vows Retaliation If U.S. Starts Trade War
headline.main: China Vows Retaliation if Trump Engages in Trade War

docs.snippet: His plan calls for reducing the supply of illicit drugs with better interdiction and tougher penalties, reducing opioid prescriptions and overall demand, and expanding access to treatment.

headline.print_headline: Tough Talk, Few Details in President’s Opioid Plan
headline.main: Trump Offers Tough Talk but Few Details in Unveiling Plan to Combat Opioids

docs.snippet: Markets like to look into the future, and with this latest trade policy, they don't like what they see.

headline.print_headline: Tariffs Are Small Economically, but Big Symbolically
headline.main: The Trump Steel Tariffs Are Economically Small and Symbolically Huge

docs.snippet: It is about the preservation of a certain social order, not the rule of law.

headline.main: Chris Hayes: What ‘Law and Order’ Means to Trump

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump said Mr. Biden “would go down fast and hard” if the two men fought. Mr. Biden had said that, if he was in high school, he would “beat the hell” out of Mr. Trump for disrespecting women.

headline.main: Trump Threatens Joe Biden, Saying He ‘Would Go Down Fast and Hard’ if They Fought

docs.snippet: Spring break couldn't have come at a better time for Melania Trump.

headline.print_headline: Melania Trump Escapes Glare of Affair Headlines in Florida
headline.main: Melania Trump Escapes Glare of Affair Headlines in Florida

docs.snippet: It was the latest indication that President Trump is standing by his decision to impose a 25 percent tariff on steel imports and a 10 percent tariff on aluminum imports from all countries.

headline.print_headline: Trade War Escalates With Threat On E.U. Cars
headline.main: Escalating Trade Fight, Trump Threatens Higher Taxes on European Cars
